title: EVA CIM Output Payload Schema V2
description: Strict specification for context payloads published to bus:operational by the Context Injection Node (CIM) in EVA 8.2.0 Architecture.

context_id.description: The unique ID for the entire interaction turn.

timestamp.description: Unix timestamp of the context publication.

state_hash_ref.description: Hash of the system state this payload refers to.

payload_type.description: The type of payload being published.

payload.description: The actual context payload, structure depends on payload_type.
